reviewText: The instructions are dubbed over in English. The moves Marcelo teaches are great; especially if you are small and flexible. I think bigger less flexible people would have difficulty doing some of the moves.

Great series by one of the world's best BJJ practitioners to date. Translated and easy to understand, Marcelo does a great job at starting with a base technique, and then working from that position to transition to others. One of the best BJJ instructional DVDs that I've ever seen. Worth the $.
